footer.tagline: Fullstack developer specializing in creating high-performance and visually appealing digital experiences.

hero.title: Turning Ideas Into
hero.subtitle: Fullstack Web & Mobile Developer focused on creating beautiful, responsive and functional applications with modern technologies.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: My Journey as a Developer
about.description: I'm a passionate Fullstack Developer with extensive experience in building web and mobile applications that combine beautiful design with robust functionality.
about.experience: With over 5 years of experience in web and mobile development, I've worked on a diverse range of projects, from e-commerce platforms to enterprise applications. My approach combines technical expertise with creative problem-solving to deliver solutions that exceed expectations.
about.specialization: I specialize in creating responsive and performant applications using modern technologies like React, Next.js, and React Native on the frontend, and Node.js, Express, MySQL, and Prisma on the backend.

skills.title: Skills & Technologies
skills.subtitle: I specialize in the following technologies and frameworks, bringing extensive experience and professional quality to every project.

projects.title: My Recent Work
projects.subtitle: Here are some of the projects I've worked on. Each project reflects my commitment to quality and attention to detail.

project1.title: ShopMaisMZ
project1.description: A comprehensive e-commerce platform serving Mozambique with 2-day delivery in Nampula. Features include product catalog, shopping cart, secure payments (MPesa and PayPal), and a 5-day return policy.

project2.title: Fluent Academy
project2.description: A comprehensive English learning platform featuring courses from beginner to advanced levels. Includes 120+ lessons, 20+ hours of content, interactive quizzes, podcasts, and certification. Supports various learning paths with subscription-based access.

project3.title: LeadsAI
project3.description: An innovative AI-powered lead generation platform that helps businesses identify and engage with high-quality prospects. Features include persona enrichment, prospect targeting, automated outreach, and analytics for optimizing marketing strategies.

experience.title: Work Experience
experience.subtitle: My professional history and the companies I've collaborated with throughout my career.

job1.title: Fullstack Software Engineer
job1.description: Responsible for creating comprehensive solutions for clients across all levels of development, from concept to deployment, including various types of applications and digital solutions.
job1.responsibility1: Develop end-to-end solutions tailored to diverse client requirements
job1.responsibility2: Implement fullstack applications using modern JavaScript frameworks
job1.responsibility3: Lead technical architecture decisions for client projects

job2.title: Fullstack Developer
job2.description: Specialized in creating frontend applications and websites, working on both client-facing interfaces and backend services to deliver complete digital solutions.
job2.responsibility1: Developed responsive web applications with modern JavaScript frameworks
job2.responsibility2: Built and maintained backend services to support frontend applications
job2.responsibility3: Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality products

job3.title: Fullstack Developer
job3.description: Started my professional journey as a fullstack developer, working on various web development projects and gaining expertise in both frontend and backend technologies.
job3.responsibility1: Created responsive web interfaces with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
job3.responsibility2: Developed server-side applications and integrated with databases
job3.responsibility3: Participated in full software development lifecycle from concept to deployment

cta.title: Let's Create Something Amazing Together
cta.description: I'm currently available for freelance projects and full-time opportunities. Whether you need a complete website, a custom application, or technical expertise, I'd love to hear about your vision.
